xadmin 编辑form动态下拉框内容

20小时 ago
mojak
1 minute

在admin中通过使用formfield_for_dbfield函数实现动态加载下拉框

# 模拟动态创建下拉框内容
def get_choices():
    return (('t1','t1'),('t2','t2'))

class MiddlewareInstanceAdmin(object):
    ...
    style_fields = {'tags': 'm2m_transfer', 'apps': 'm2m_transfer', }
    ## 通过两个下划线可以搜索外部模型相关字段
    search_fields = ('host__ip','tags__name')

    # 判断字段名称是from_type 或是type 动态设置choices,实现动态加载下拉框
    def formfield_for_dbfield(self, db_field, **kwargs):
        if db_field.name == 'from_type' or db_field.name == 'type':
            kwargs['choices'] = get_choices()
            db_field.choices = kwargs['choices']

        attrs = self.get_field_attrs(db_field, **kwargs)
        return db_field.formfield(**dict(attrs, **kwargs))
